verbose_text: In addition, salvianolic acid, a compound that similar to SF, decreases GGPP synthesis, has been reported to lower portal pressure and inhibit HSC contraction by downregulating the RhoA / Rho-kinase pathway.
evidence: acid, a compound that similar to SF, decreases GGPP synthesis              , has been reported to lower portal pressure and inhibit HSC contraction by downregulating the RhoA/Rho-kinase
